name: Noctiny
languages: Common, plus the language spoken by the noctini's master

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The noctiny has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Pact Wrath
traits.desc: One of the noctiny's weapons is infused with power. Its attacks with this weapon count as magical, and it adds its Charisma bonus to the weapon's damage (included below).

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The noctiny is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability score is Charisma (save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following warlock spells. * Cantrips (at will): chill touch, eldritch blast, poison spray * 1st level (4 slots): armor of agathys, charm person, hellish rebuke, hex * 2nd level (2 slots): crown of madness, misty step

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The noctiny makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Pact Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used in two hands.
